title:
KYBO 3.0.0
***Romance***
Fifty Shades of Grey (2015)
http://cdni.condenast.co.uk/720x1080/d_f/Fifty-Shades-of-Grey-Film-t_720x1080.jpg http://images6.fanpop.com/image/photos/33800000/fifty-shades-of-grey-fifty-shades-trilogy-33869300-1920-1200.jpg Literature student Anastasia Steele's life changes forever when she meets handsome, yet tormented, billionaire Christian Grey.
Romeo and Juliet (2014)
http://ecx.images-amazon.com/images/I/51dsfF5JLXL.jpg http://i.ytimg.com/vi/mu-lMzHSNNk/maxresdefault.jpg Orlando Bloom and Condola Rashad take on the title characters in a modern adaptation of the timeless classic, Romeo and Juliet. This Broadway stage production is being broadcast in movie theaters.
Dirty Dancing (1987)
http://upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/en/0/00/Dirty_Dancing.jpg http://upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/en/1/13/Dirty-dancing-coverx-large.jpg Spending the summer in a holiday camp with her family, Frances "Baby" Houseman falls in love with the camp's dance instructor Johnny Castle.
